original_text: He did what was right in the eyes of the Lord and followed the ways of his father David, not turning aside to the right or to the left.
korean_text: 여호와 보시기에 정직하게 행하여 그의 조상 다윗의 길로 걸으며 좌우로 치우치지 아니하고

sentences.original_text: He did what was right in the eyes of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 여호와 보시기에 정직한 일을 행하였고

sentences.original_text: and followed the ways of his father David
not turning aside to the right or to the left
